thread.title: Dad learns to walk again to take daughter down the aisle
thread.title_full: Dad learns to walk again to take daughter down the aisle | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: palmbeachpost
title: Dad learns to walk again to take daughter down the aisle
text:
By HotTopics.tv
OLD ORCHARD BEACH, Maine - This is unconditional love at its finest.
Photo: Video still Ralph Dunquette is a survivor. He won his battle against leukemia after extensive chemotherapy, being in a coma for five days and going blind in one eye according to WCSH . Now, he relies on a wheelchair to get around.
So on his daughter's wedding day, he wasn't letting anything stop him from walking his girl down the aisle. He underwent extensive physical therapy to prepare for the big day.
>> Read more trending stories
On Oct. 10, Heather Dunquette married the love of her life in Old Orchard Beach, Maine. Not only did her dad walk her down the aisle, but he also performed the ceremony and danced the traditional father-daughter dance.
Watch the touching moment Ralph hoisted himself out of his wheelchair to walk her down the aisle.
